basic_info.name: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology FAQs

faqs.question: Does Vignan's Institute of Information Technology provide hostel accommodation to the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Swathi Institute of Technology and Sciences provides separate hostel facilities for boys & girls with spacious buildings.

faqs.question: How is the library of Vignan's Institute of Information Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.Vignan's Institute of Information Technology has a spacious library with 54800 books and National and International Journals. Students have a facility of access to the Digital Library with the Internet.

faqs.question: Does Vignan's Institute of Information Technology have an industrial visit facility?
faqs.answer: Ans.All the students in the second and third have an industrial visit facility available. This industrial visit provided an insight into how companies work.

faqs.question: Does Vignan's Institute of Information Technology have an internship facility?
faqs.answer: Ans.All the students in the second and third have an internship facility available. This facility is provided to the students to give them an insight into the companies.

faqs.question: What is the intake capacity for the MBA course at Vignan's Institute of Information Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.Vignan's Institute of Information Technology accepts only 120 applications for the MBA course.

Section.name: About VIIT Visakhapatnam
Section.description:
Established in 2002, Vignan's Institute of Information Technology (VIIT) is a private institute offering UG, PG and Diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology across various specializations. The institute is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada and it is approved by AICTE, UGC, and NBA.
VIITâ€™s most popular courses include BTech in 8 specializations and M.Tech in 8 specializations. Apart from that, the college also offers an MBA and an MCA degree course. Candidates can seek admission to B.Tech and M.Tech after appearing in the EAMCET and PGECET entrance exams respectively. For MBA and MCA, admissions will be conducted through Integrated Common Entrance Test (ICET).
Vignan's Institute of Information Technology has an active working relationship with several leading corporates of India to provide placement assistance to their students. The college campus is well equipped with well maintained facilities.

Ques. Does Vignan's Institute of Information Technology provide hostel accommodation to the students?
Ans. Swathi Institute of Technology and Sciences provides separate hostel facilities for boys & girls with spacious buildings.
Ques. How is the library of Vignan's Institute of Information Technology?
Ans. Vignan's Institute of Information Technology has a spacious library with 54800 books and National and International Journals. Students have a facility of access to the Digital Library with the Internet.
Ques. Does Vignan's Institute of Information Technology have an industrial visit facility?
Ans. All the students in the second and third have an industrial visit facility available. This industrial visit provided an insight into how companies work.
Ques. Does Vignan's Institute of Information Technology have an internship facility?
Ans. All the students in the second and third have an internship facility available. This facility is provided to the students to give them an insight into the companies.
Ques. What is the intake capacity for the MBA course at Vignan's Institute of Information Technology?
Ans. Vignan's Institute of Information Technology accepts only 120 applications for the MBA course.
